protocol_name: High quality DNA from Fungi for long read sequencing e.g. PacBio
protocol_name_html: High quality DNA from Fungi for long read sequencing e.g. PacBio
description:
Extraction of high quality DNA for long read sequencing e.g. PacBio

Optimized for DNA extraction from wheat stripe rust spores and also tested on barley leaf rust.

Buffers are best when fresh and not older than 3-6 months. Buffered Phenol:Chloroform:Isoamylalcohol (25:24:1) should not be older than 3 months.

Critical steps to obtain high quality DNA:

  • Do NOT heat samples during DNA extractions! Perform all steps at RT or 4oC as indicated.
  • Do NOT incubate samples with KAc for prolonged time periods
  • Perform two steps of buffered Phenol:Chloroform:Isoamylalcohol purification to reduce co-purifying metabolites.

 

DNA fragments were well above the 40kb mark based on Pippin Pulse Gels. The sequencing center performed a second AMPure purification step before library construction. Summary statistics of sequencing runs to follow.
guidelines:
Modified from protocols of Prof. Pietro Spanu (Imperial College, London) and T. M.

Fulton, J. Chunwongse, S. D. Tanksley, Pl Mol Biol Rep 13, 207 (1995)

Optimized for DNA extraction from wheat stripe rust spores and also tested on barley leaf rust

Buffers are best when fresh and not older than 3-6 months. Buffered Phenol:Chloroform:Isoamylalcohol (25:24:1) should not be older than 3 months.

 

Critical steps to obtain high quality DNA:

  • Do NOT heat samples during DNA extractions! Perform all steps at RT or 4oC as indicated.
  • Do NOT incubate samples with KAc for prolonged time periods
  • Perform two steps of buffered Phenol:Chloroform:Isoamylalcohol purification to reduce co-purifying metabolites.

Reagents required

BUFFER A: 0.35 M sorbitol

0.1 M Tris-HCl, pH 9

5 mM EDTA, pH 8

autoclave to sterilize

 

BUFFER B: 0.2 M Tris-HCl, pH 9

50 mM EDTA, pH 8

2 M NaCl

2% CTAB

autoclave to sterilize

 

BUFFER C: 5% Sarkosyl (N-lauroylsarcosine sodium salt SIGMA L5125)

Filter-sterilize

 

Other solutions:

Potassium Acetate 5M (KAc precipitate polysaccharides) pH 7.5

Polyvinylpyrrolidone (40000 MW) 1 % [w/v] (Sigma PVP40)

Sodium Acetate (NaAc) 3M pH 5.2

Filter-sterilize

 

Isopropanol 100%

Ethanol 70%

Buffered Phenol:Chloroforme:Isoamylalcool P:C:I (25:24:1, Sigma P2069)

Autoclave acid washed Sand

 

Enzymes

RNAse T1 (1000 U/ml, Thermo Fisher EN0541)

Proteinase K (800U/ml, NEB P81072)

 
AMPure beads from Beckman


Lysis Buffer For 17.5 ml for 500 mg starting material

2.5 volume of Buffer A 6.5 ml

2.5 volume of Buffer B 6.5 ml

1.0 volume of Buffer C 2.6 ml

PVP 0.1 % 1.75 ml

components.data: Mix lysis buffer by votexing and briefly head to 64 °C. Let cool to room temperature for use in 50mL Falcon tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix lysis buffer by votexing and briefly head to 64 °C. Let cool to room temperature for use in 50mL Falcon tubes.
add 10uL (10kU) RNAse T1to lysis buffer

components.data: Grind tissue/spores with liquid nitrogen in a mortar with sand, use 1g of sand per 100mg of starting material, grind for 2 mins in 4x 15 sec burst adding liquid nitrogen after each 15 sec grinding burst
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Grind tissue/spores with liquid nitrogen in a mortar with sand, use 1g of sand per 100mg of starting material, grind for 2 mins in 4x 15 sec burst adding liquid nitrogen after each 15 sec grinding burst

components.data: transfer powder to 50mL Falcon containing lysis buffer and RNAse, mix well by vortexing
components.name: Description

source_data.description: transfer powder to 50mL Falcon containing lysis buffer and RNAse, mix well by vortexing

components.data: incubate at RT for 30 mins mixing by inversion every 5 mins
components.name: Description

source_data.description: incubate at RT for 30 mins mixing by inversion every 5 mins

components.data: add 200uL Proteinase K, incubate at RT for 30 mins mixing by inversion every 5 mins
components.name: Description

source_data.description: add 200uL Proteinase K, incubate at RT for 30 mins mixing by inversion every 5 mins
cool on ice for 5 mins

components.data: add 3.5 mL of KAc 5M, mix by inversion, incubate on ice for max 5 mins
components.name: Description

source_data.description: add 3.5 mL of KAc 5M, mix by inversion, incubate on ice for max 5 mins
spin at 4oC and 5000g for 12 mins

components.data: transfer supernatant to fresh Falcon tube containing 18ml P/C/I and mix by inversion for 2 mins
components.name: Description

source_data.description: transfer supernatant to fresh Falcon tube containing 18ml P/C/I and mix by inversion for 2 mins
spin at 4 °C and 4000g for 10 mins

components.data: transfer supernatant (might be milky but do not worry) to fresh Falcon tube containing 18ml P/C/I and mix by inversion for 2 mins
components.name: Description

source_data.description: transfer supernatant (might be milky but do not worry) to fresh Falcon tube containing 18ml P/C/I and mix by inversion for 2 mins
spin at 4 °C and 4000g for 10 mins

components.data: transfer supernatant (~17mL) to fresh Falcon tube and add 5uL RNAse T1
components.name: Description

source_data.description: transfer supernatant (~17mL) to fresh Falcon tube and add 5uL RNAse T1
incubate for 20-30mins at RT

components.data: add 1.8mL NaAc and mix by inversion
components.name: Description

source_data.description: add 1.8mL NaAc and mix by inversion

components.data: add 18mL RT isopropanol and mix by inversion
components.name: Description

source_data.description: add 18mL RT isopropanol and mix by inversion
incubate at RT for 5-10mins
spin at 4 °C and 10000g for 30 mins

components.data: carefully pipette off supernatant till about 1-2 mL left, DNA will form a mostly translucent to white film/pellet at the bottom of the tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: carefully pipette off supernatant till about 1-2 mL left, DNA will form a mostly translucent to white film/pellet at the bottom of the tube

components.data: use 1mL pipette tip to transfer pellet and remaining liquid into fresh 1.7mL eppendorf tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: use 1mL pipette tip to transfer pellet and remaining liquid into fresh 1.7mL eppendorf tube

components.data: spin in table top centrifuge for 5 mins at 13000g
components.name: Description

source_data.description: spin in table top centrifuge for 5 mins at 13000g

components.data: remove supernatant with pipette and wash with 1.5mL fresh 70% Ethanol, invert several times to dislodge pellet
components.name: Description

source_data.description: remove supernatant with pipette and wash with 1.5mL fresh 70% Ethanol, invert several times to dislodge pellet

components.data: spin in table top centrifuge for 5 mins at 13000g
components.name: Description

source_data.description: spin in table top centrifuge for 5 mins at 13000g

components.data: remove supernatant with pipette and wash with 1.5mL fresh 70% Ethanol, invert several times to dislodge pellet
components.name: Description

source_data.description: remove supernatant with pipette and wash with 1.5mL fresh 70% Ethanol, invert several times to dislodge pellet

components.data: spin in table top centrifuge for 5 mins at 13000g
components.name: Description

source_data.description: spin in table top centrifuge for 5 mins at 13000g
remove supernatant with pipette

components.data: spin in table top centrifuge for 1 min at 13000g
components.name: Description

source_data.description: spin in table top centrifuge for 1 min at 13000g
remove remaining ethanol with pipette
air-dry pellet for 7 mins

components.data: add 200uL of 10mM Tris pH9 leave at RT for 3 hours
components.name: Description

source_data.description: add 200uL of 10mM Tris pH9 leave at RT for 3 hours

components.data: flick tube slightly for mixing and add 200uL of TE buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: flick tube slightly for mixing and add 200uL of TE buffer
leave at RT over night

components.data: next day add another 100uL TE buffer and incubate for 1h at 28 °C with 1400rpm shaking
components.name: Description

source_data.description: next day add another 100uL TE buffer and incubate for 1h at 28 °C with 1400rpm shaking

components.data: Measure dsDNA concentration using BR Qubit and measure absorbance with Nanodrop. At this point Qubit to Nanodrop ratios were 1/1000
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Measure dsDNA concentration using BR Qubit and measure absorbance with Nanodrop. At this point Qubit to Nanodrop ratios were 1/1000

source_data.description: elute in 10mM Tris pH8

components.name: Description

components.data: at this stage Qubit to Nanodrop ratios were 0.64, 260/280 1.87 and 260/230 1.37
components.name: Description

components.data: Samples were submitted to Ramaciotti (http://www.ramaciotti.unsw.edu.au/) sequencing centre in Sydney. Excellent personel performed quality control, prepared 15-20kb libraries and we ran 13 SMRT cells with P6 chemistry. Some summary statistics are shown below.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Samples were submitted to Ramaciotti (http://www.ramaciotti.unsw.edu.au/) sequencing centre in Sydney. Excellent personel performed quality control, prepared 15-20kb libraries and we ran 13 SMRT cells with P6 chemistry. Some summary statistics are shown below.

components.data:
Summary statistics for all 12 SMRT cells combined 

********************************************************************************
 Total sequence amount:                           1.263691e+10 
 Number of reads:                                 1.181543e+06 
 Median read length:                                      9632 
 Mean read length:                                       10695

components.data: use AMPure beads for secondary clean up at beads 0.45 (Vol/Vol) following the PacBio protocol
components.name: Description

source_data.description: use AMPure beads for secondary clean up at beads 0.45 (Vol/Vol) following the PacBio protocol
